license.message: Valid License Tag in lockdev-1.0.4-0.28.20111007git.el8.i686: LGPLv2

ownership.message: File /usr/sbin/lockdev has group `lock` on i686, but should be `root`
ownership.remedy: Bin path files must be owned by the bin_group set in the rpminspect configuration, which is usually root.
